OmniDataTransform.description: v244.0 - It's the OmniStudio DataMapper which is responsible for transforming the Vlocity Data Model to TMFourm data model for Product Offering API
OmniDataTransform.name: TMFTMForumProductOfferingResult

omniDataTransformItem.formulaConverted: | var:product:vlocity_cmt__ProductSpecId__c var:null != | var:requestUrl 'productSpecification/' var:product:vlocity_cmt__ProductSpecId__c CONCAT var:null IF
omniDataTransformItem.name: TMFTMForumProductOfferingResult

omniDataTransformItem.formulaConverted: | var:productChildItems:Id var:null != | var:requestUrl 'productOffering/' var:productChildItems:vlocity_cmt__ParentProductId__r:Id CONCAT var:null IF
omniDataTransformItem.name: TMFTMForumProductOfferingResult

omniDataTransformItem.formulaConverted: | var:vlocityAttachments:Id var:null != | '/services/data/' var:apiVersion '/sobjects/vlocity_cmt__VlocityAttachment__c/' var:vlocityAttachments:Id CONCAT var:null IF
omniDataTransformItem.name: TMFTMForumProductOfferingResult

omniDataTransformItem.formulaConverted: | var:product:vlocity_cmt__SpecificationSubType__c var:null != | var:product:vlocity_cmt__SpecificationSubType__c 'Bundle' == true false IF var:null IF
omniDataTransformItem.name: TMFTMForumProductOfferingResult

omniDataTransformItem.formulaConverted: | var:product:Id var:null != | var:requestUrl 'productOffering/' var:product:Id CONCAT var:null IF
omniDataTransformItem.name: TMFTMForumProductOfferingResult

omniDataTransformItem.formulaConverted: | var:priceListEntries:vlocity_cmt__ProductId__r:vlocity_cmt__SpecificationSubType__c var:null != | var:priceListEntries:vlocity_cmt__ProductId__r:vlocity_cmt__SpecificationSubType__c 'Bundle' == var:priceListEntries:vlocity_cmt__IsBasePrice__c && true false IF var:null IF
omniDataTransformItem.name: TMFTMForumProductOfferingResult

omniDataTransformItem.formulaConverted: | var:priceListEntries:Id var:null != | '/services/data/' var:apiVersion '/sobjects/vlocity_cmt__PriceListEntry__c/' var:priceListEntries:Id CONCAT var:null IF
omniDataTransformItem.name: TMFTMForumProductOfferingResult

omniDataTransformItem.formulaConverted: | var:product:IsActive var:null != | var:product:IsActive 'Active' 'Inactive' IF var:null IF
omniDataTransformItem.name: TMFTMForumProductOfferingResult
